attributes.action: Leave Overseas Aid to the Voluntary Sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At a time when British taxpayers are dying for lack of NHS funding (e.g. unaffordable cancer drugs) it is wrong that they are forced to pay billions in taxes for the benefit of aliens.
Those who wish to do so have many opportunities through OXFAM and the like.
